overview: A peasant Xingfa Ma works at a garage in Beijing. One day, he receives a phone call from his loved one, Ga, saying his mom is ill at hospital and need money. Xing fa comes to his boss brother Kun and asking for salary, but rejected by his boss. He has no choice but to buy scalped ticket using his left savings and borrow many from other workers. What he doesn't know is an unimaginably queer life is lying ahead him...
title: The Long Way Home
